Paragraph: POBDTPD and PEBDTPD devices displayed reasonable open - circuit voltages ( V oc ) of 0.70 and 0.72 V , respectively , considering their HOMO levels , -5.23 and -5.37 eV , respectively.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| V oc |

The paragraph only mentions two property names:

1. V oc (open-circuit voltage)
2. HOMO (highest occupied molecular orbital)

Both of these properties are related to the material properties of the POBDTPD and PEBDTPD devices.

Please identify the "Property Value" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: POBDTPD and PEBDTPD devices displayed reasonable open - circuit voltages ( V oc ) of 0.70 and 0.72 V , respectively , considering their HOMO levels , -5.23 and -5.37 eV , respectively.

Let's think step by step.

```
| Property Value |
| --- |
| V oc | 0.70 V |
| V oc | 0.72 V |
| HOMO level | -5.23 eV |
| HOMO level | -5.37 eV |
```
The property values in the paragraph are:

* V oc (open-circuit voltage)
* HOMO level (highest occupied molecular orbital energy level)

The values of these properties are:

* V oc = 0.70 V and 0.72 V
* HOMO level = -5.23 eV and -5.37 eV

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Value of material property" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Sure, here's the updated table with only the entities that clearly refer to the value of a material property:

| Property Value |

The only property values mentioned in the paragraph are the open-circuit voltages (V oc) of 0.70 V and 0.72 V. The HOMO levels are not directly related to the value of a material property, but rather provide additional information about the molecular orbitals of the materials. Therefore, they are not included in the table.
